sentences.en: A fallen tree barred our way.
sentences.cn: 一棵倒下的树拦住了我们的路.

sentences.en: After the member was caught cheating , he was barred from the club.
sentences.cn: 那会员行骗被抓后, 被开除会籍.

sentences.en: Brazilian soccer boss Carlos Parreira hit out angrily last night after his side were barred from training at Wembley.
sentences.cn: 昨晚巴西足球队主帅卡洛斯·佩雷拉因球队被禁止在温布利球场训练而大发雷霆。

sentences.en: He barred himself in the room and thought about what to do next.
sentences.cn: 他把自己关在屋里,考虑下一步该怎么办.

sentences.en: He was barred from membership because of his bad reputation.
sentences.cn: 他因名声不好被禁止入会.

sentences.en: I rushed to the door, only to discover that it was locked and barred.
sentences.cn: 我冲到门边, 却发现门已被锁死了.

sentences.en: Many jobs were barred to them.
sentences.cn: 很多工作将他们拒之门外。

sentences.en: The children cried when they couldn't get into the house; their mother had barred them out.
sentences.cn: 孩子们进不了屋,又哭又叫, 他们的妈妈把他们关在门外了.

sentences.en: The highway here is barred whenever the train passes.
sentences.cn: 每当火车通过时,这里的公路都要拦起来.

sentences.en: The horses died in the fire because they were barred in the hut.
sentences.cn: 马在火灾中被烧死,因为它们被关在马棚里.

sentences.en: The house has been barred and bolted to prevent re-entry.
sentences.cn: 房子已经被封了，门被闩上，防止有人入内。

sentences.en: The windows were closed and shuttered, the door was barred.
sentences.cn: 窗户都关紧了，百叶窗都拉下了，门也闩上了。

sentences.en: When she'd get angry it was no holds barred.
sentences.cn: 她发起火来什么都干得出。

sentences.en: When the family left the house for the winter, they barred the windows up.
sentences.cn: 他们全家冬天离家去避寒时, 把窗户全部关上了.

trans.tran_cn: 有木栅的，隔绝的，被禁止的
trans.tran_en: a barred window, gate etc has bars across it
